00025 #ifndef __L4_KTRACE_H__
00026 #define __L4_KTRACE_H__
00027 
00028 #include <l4/sys/types.h>
00029 #include <l4/sys/kdebug.h>
00030 
00031 #define LOG_EVENT_CONTEXT_SWITCH   0  
00034 #define LOG_EVENT_IPC_SHORTCUT     1  
00037 #define LOG_EVENT_IRQ_RAISED       2  
00040 #define LOG_EVENT_TIMER_IRQ        3  
00043 #define LOG_EVENT_THREAD_EX_REGS   4  
00047 #define LOG_EVENT_MAX_EVENTS      16  
00055 typedef struct
00056 {
00058   l4_umword_t tracebuffer0;
00060   l4_umword_t size0;
00062   l4_umword_t version0;
00064   l4_umword_t tracebuffer1;
00066   l4_umword_t size1;
00068   l4_umword_t version1;
00070   l4_umword_t logevents[LOG_EVENT_MAX_EVENTS];
00071 
00073   l4_umword_t scaler_tsc_to_ns;
00075   l4_umword_t scaler_tsc_to_us;
00077   l4_umword_t scaler_ns_to_tsc;
00078 
00080   l4_umword_t cnt_context_switch;
00082   l4_umword_t cnt_addr_space_switch;
00084   l4_umword_t cnt_shortcut_failed;
00086   l4_umword_t cnt_shortcut_success;
00088   l4_umword_t cnt_irq;
00090   l4_umword_t cnt_ipc_long;
00091 
00092 } l4_tracebuffer_status_t;

00170 L4_INLINE l4_tracebuffer_status_t *
00171 fiasco_tbuf_get_status(void)
00172 {
00173   /* Not implemented */
00174   return (l4_tracebuffer_status_t *)__KDEBUG_ARM_PARAM_1(29, 0);
00175 }
00176 
00177 L4_INLINE l4_addr_t
00178 fiasco_tbuf_get_status_phys(void)
00179 {
00180   enter_kdebug("fiasco_tbuf_get_status_phys not there");
00181   return ~0UL;
00182 }
00183 
00184 L4_INLINE l4_umword_t
00185 fiasco_tbuf_log(const char *text)
00186 {
00187   return __KDEBUG_ARM_PARAM_2(29, 1, text);
00188 }
00189 
00190 L4_INLINE l4_umword_t
00191 fiasco_tbuf_log_3val(const char *text, unsigned v1, unsigned v2, unsigned v3)
00192 {
00193   return __KDEBUG_ARM_PARAM_5(29, 4, text, v1, v2, v3);
00194 }
00195

00198 {

00200 }

00206 }

00218 }
